general: Gain 1 (S) for each unrouted Hearthkyn Warrior or Bastion Commerce Vessel to a maximum of 3 (S).

unit: Hearthkyn/Bastion Vessel: Spend 1 [S] to rally 1 of your units and gain 1 (S).
Hearthkyn/Hearthguard/Bastion Vessel: If you have more [B] than your opponent, force your opponent to rout 1 of their units or spend 1 [B] or 1 [S].
Hearthkyn/Bastion Vessel: Your opponent discards the top card of their combat deck. Gain 1 icon on that card as dice.
Hearthkyn/Hearthguard/Bastion Vessel: Gain 1 (B) or 1 (S) for each [M] you have more than your opponent.
Hearthguard: In this execution round your opponent suffers 1 extra damage that cannot be reduced by shield icons a player has on dice, combat tokens and faceup combat cards.
Bastion/Hearthkyn/Champion/Bastion Vessel: Spend 1 [B] to convert 1 [B] into 1 [M]. *newpara* Gain 1 [S].
Hearthkyn/Hearthguard/Bastion Vessel: If you used the general ability to retreat units spend 1 [B] to rally 1 of your units that retreated.
Stronghold: Move 1 of your ships from this area to any other friendly area. Then move 1 of your ships from any area to this area.
Champion/Stronghold: Gain 2 (B) and 2 (S) unless your opponent spends 1 [M].

Sagitaur/Stronghold: Move any amount of units or ships into this area from any adjacent systems who have a legal route to this area. For each unit or ship that moved gain 1 (B) or 1 (S). *newpara* You may retreat any number of units or ships after this combat into any number of areas you have a legal route to right before the retreat phase.
Sagitaur/Stronghold: Choose [B], [S] or [M]. Your opponent loses all of those dice.

general: When you use your dominate ability and purchase a combat card, you may spend a forge token to take a second combat card of the same command level you purchased and place it in your combat deck. Then remove a combat card from your combat deck and place it in the combat upgrade deck. LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.
After you resolve this order, you may move 1 ship in the active system to any adjacent void. This can start combat. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.
When you reveal this order token, you may gain 1 forge token. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.
After you resolve this order, you may spend 2 materiel to place a free bastion in the active system on a friendly world already containing a bastion. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.
